name: QR Print
author: Donovan Hutchinson

sections.description: The plugin simply adds a QR code to the footer (where you include wp_footer) of your pages.
sections.installation:
1. Upload qrprint.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it! A QR code containing the current page URL will automatically be added to the footer of each page
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • Moved CSS rules to of page
  • Changed classname to reduce chance of conflict
  • Added some extra print-only text (“Printed from: URL”)

0.2.1

  • Updated readme.txt to reflect compatibility with 3.2
  • Screenshot comment added

0.2

  • Initial version

short_description: QR Print adds a QR code to the print version of each page, containing the URL of the current page.
description: The plugin simply adds a QR code to the footer (where you include wp_footer) of your pages.

screenshots.caption: A QR code (this one contains the URL of the homepage for this plugin)
